details: Learn the fundamentals of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Explore the basics of data science, including data analysis and visualization.
Master the art of graphic design using industry-standard tools and techniques.
Build mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms using popular frameworks.
An introductory course to machine learning concepts and algorithms.
Learn the fundamentals of digital marketing, including SEO and social media strategies.
Explore real-world applications of artificial intelligence in various industries.
Master the basics of photography, from composition to post-processing.
Learn essential cybersecurity concepts and practices to secure digital assets.
